pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
